content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nI was reminded of past events and my computer executed the shell command "execute_shell_popen" which started a subprocess with PID 1167. Recently, I read the file "/app/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/Rickle-Whitepaper.txt" and executed the shell commands "mv Rickle-Whitepaper.pdf /app/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace && cd /app/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace && pdftotext Rickle-Whitepaper.pdf Rickle-Whitepaper.txt" with subprocesses started with PID 1227 and 1264 respectively. Then, I executed the shell command "cd /app/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace && wget https://rickle.io/whitepaper/Rickle-Whitepaper.pdf" with a subprocess started with PID 1264, and finally executed the shell command "cd /app/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace && pdftotext Rickle-Whitepaper.pdf Rickle-Whitepaper.txt".'}
"""

Latest Development:
